266 // Subtraction ---------------------------------------------------------------
267 
269 
275 template <typename Left, typename Right>
276 inline auto subt(const Left& left, const Right& right) {
277  return left.subt(right);
278 }
279 
281 
289 template <
290  typename Left, typename Right, typename Scalar,
291  typename std::enable_if<detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>::type* = nullptr>
292 inline auto subt(const Left& left, const Right& right, const Scalar factor) {
293  return left.subt(right, factor);
294 }

306  const Permutation& perm) {
307  return left.subt(right, perm);
308 }

635 template <typename Left, typename Right, typename Scalar,
636  std::enable_if_t<TiledArray::detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>* = nullptr>
637 inline auto gemm(const Left& left, const Right& right, const Scalar factor,
638  const math::GemmHelper& gemm_config) {
639  return left.gemm(right, factor, gemm_config);
640 }
641 
643 
656 template <typename Result, typename Left, typename Right, typename Scalar,
657  std::enable_if_t<TiledArray::detail::is_numeric_v<Scalar>>* = nullptr>
658 inline Result& gemm(Result& result, const Left& left, const Right& right,
659  const Scalar factor, const math::GemmHelper& gemm_config) {
660  return result.gemm(left, right, factor, gemm_config);
661 }
662 
663 template <typename... T>
664 using result_of_gemm_t = decltype(gemm(std::declval<T>()...));

807 using result_of_norm_t =
